what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: chinadevfin2 primarily data package enabling efficient method working AidData’s Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 2.0 (GCDF 2.0) R.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: AidData’s summary dataset: AidData’s Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 2.0. records known universe projects (development, commercial, representational intent) supported official financial -kind commitments (pledges) China 2000-2017, implementation details covering 22-year period (2000-2021). dataset captures 13,427 projects worth $843 billion financed 300 Chinese government institutions state-owned entities across 165 countries every major region world. AidData systematically collected quality-assured projects dataset using 2.0 version Tracking Underreported Financial Flows (TUFF) methodology. Please see AidData’s dataset website full citation details. unfamiliar dataset, following resources great place start: AidData - Policy Report: Banking Belt Road: Insights new global dataset 13,427 Chinese development projects AidData - Methodology: Tracking Underreported Financial Flows (TUFF) methodology, 2.0. AidData - Dataset Website: Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 2.0

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: chinadevfin2 still heavy development: Please use accordingly. initial phase package development aims finalize stable versions datasets, announced new package version release note. development focus building helper functions aid efficient analysis workflows dataset. chinadevfin2 personal project: package author works consultant AidData package personal project official affiliation sponsorship AidData. author build package use, hopes can grow robust package can aid researchers, policymakers, others interested gaining actionable, empirically-based insights Chinese development finance lending using GCDF 2.0 dataset.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version chinadevfin2 GitHub : package likely never published CRAN data file sizes big.
code: # install the `devtools` package if not yet installed # install.packages("devtools")  # install chinadevfin2 from GitHub devtools::install_github("t-emery/chinadevfin2")
